content.webTitle: SF & Fantasy book review: The Ten Thousand by Paul Kearney

fields.headline: The Ten Thousand
fields.bodyText: On the planet of Kuf, Rictus and Gasca are part of a force of human mercenaries known as the Macht. Kuf is ruled by the native aliens, and the brother of the king schemes to overthrow him with the help of the Macht. The bulk of the novel is the story of the ensuing bloody battles and the figures, both human and alien, caught up in them. It's a brilliant study of warfare and how individuals formulate a sense of honour, as well as being compulsively readable.
